identifier.sql_value: COALESCE(:tbl,:pkg,'')||:objtype||:code|| CASE WHEN :private THEN :userid ELSE '' END

data.content:
Date: $data PFDA no. $protocollo
Messrs
$cliente_ragione_sociale
$cliente_indirizzo
$imbarcazione_tipo $imbarcazione_nome Flag $imbarcazione_bandiera
Cargo: $cargo  
 
SERVICE DESCRIPTION EURO
Harbour master dues   $tributi_cp
Administration charge   $administration_charge
Pilot $note_pilot $pilot
Mooringmen $note_moor $mooringmen
Tug $note_tug $tug
Agency fees $note_agency $agency_fees
Customs clearance $note_customs $customs_clearance
Garbage $note_garbage $garbage
Dispensation for liquid waste $note_retain_garbage $garbage_auth_
Isps $note_isps $isps
Miscellaneous $note_misc $miscellaneous
Auth. loading/unl. bulk cargo $note_bulk_auth $bulk_auth_
$serviziextra_descrizione $descrizione $serviziextra_tariffa
TAX STAMPS $tax_stamps
TOTAL $totale_pfda
$bank_dt $stamp_ag
$note_ag

compiled._proforma_servextra: $descrizione_servizio $descrizione $tariffa
compiled.main:
Date: $data PFDA no. $protocollo
Messrs
$@cliente_id.nome
$@cliente_id.indirizzo
$@imbarcazione_id.tipo $@imbarcazione_id.nome Flag $@imbarcazione_id.bandiera
Cargo: $cargo  
 
SERVICE DESCRIPTION EURO
Harbour master dues   $diritticp
Administration charge   $admcharge
Pilot $notepilot $pilot
Mooringmen $notemoor $moor
Tug $notetug $tug
Agency fees $noteagency $agency
Customs clearance $notecustoms $customs
Garbage $notegarbage $garbage
Dispensation for liquid waste $noteretaingb $retaingarbage
Isps $noteisps $isps
Miscellaneous $notemisc $misc
Auth. loading/unl. bulk cargo $notebulk $bulkauth
$@proforma_servextra
TAX STAMPS $stamp
TOTAL $totalepfda
$bank_dt $stamp_ag^stamp_ag
